Gokulam BioTech Products

All products include minimum Guarantee.

LIQUID Bio-Fertilizers.

  • KRISHI - Acetobacter
    also referred to recently as Gluconacetobacter and is recommended as a biofertilizer for sugarcane.
  • KRISHI - Azospirillum
    is a beneficial soil-borne bacterium capable of fixing considerable quantity of nitrogen in soil.
  • KRISHI - Phosphobacterium
    is a liquid biofertilizer containing pure culture of naturally occurring soil-borne phosphorus solubilising bacterium.
  • KRISHI - Potash Mobiliser
    is a liquid biofertilizer containing pure cultures of naturally occurring soil-borne Potash Mobilising bacterium
  • KRISHI - Rhizosphere pH Regulator
    is a unique product developed for soil having an alkaline pH range.
  • KRISHI - Silicate Solubiliser
    a bacterium capable of solubilising insoluble silica in soil is introduced to the farming community
  • KRISHI - Zinc Solubiliser
    is a liquid biofertilizer containing pure cultures of naturally-occurring soil-borne Zinc Solubilising bacterium

Pricing FAQ

What types of payment do you accept?
Credit cards including MasterCard, Visa or American Express.
Can I change my plan at a later time?
Yes, you can upgrade and downgrade your plan at anytime.
Do you offer pricing for nonprofit organizations?
Yes, send us a message and we'll set you up on our nonprofit pricing.
Questions?
Contact us for any further questions at contact.
